tr.edu.gtu.bilmuh.kasimsuzen

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • tr.edu.gtu.bilmuh.kasimsuzen.Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Created by Kasım süzen 111044034 on 28.04.2016 This classed holds needed methods and data structure for simulation of customer queue using priority as Customer 1> Customer 2 > Customer 3

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void fileReader()
      This function reads customer datas from file and store them to Arraylist for customers if file can not be found or file can not be read for any reason there will be error message show

      Increments time by given hour and minute
      private void logger()
      In every 20 hour system will log all transaction that been made since the beginning of the program to a log file as log_for_"inputfilename.extension".log

    • Method Detail

      • fileReader

        public void fileReader()
        This function reads customer datas from file and store them to Arraylist for customers if file can not be found or file can not be read for any reason there will be error message show

      • run

        public void run()

      • logger

        private void logger()
        In every 20 hour system will log all transaction that been made since the beginning of the program to a log file as log_for_"inputfilename.extension".log

      • updateQueue

        private void updateQueue()
        Updates customerQueue using data from customers Array list. If current time is bigger or equal to first entries arrival time, first element will be removed from customers array list will be add to customerQueue and this operation will continue until first element of Array list's is have arrival time bigger than current time.

      • incrementTime

        private void incrementTime(int hour,
                           int minute)
        Increments time by given hour and minute
        Parameters:
        hour - hour to add current time
        minute - minute to add current time
